Legacy_feedback-description: Appreciation? Compliment? Criticism? You are welcome to provide feedback to the staff team via email or join the discussion on our forum!
Legacy_no-atc-online: There is currently no online ATC.
Legacy_no-pilot-online: There is currently no online pilot.
Legacy_no-future-atc: There is currently no ATC schedule.
Legacy_maintenance: This page is currently under maintenance :(
Legacy_controller-list_description: The list below is displayed based on the controller data in our ATC Center. Automatic data updates may have at most 24 hours of delay. Only controllers (including visiting controller) with controlling permission on at least one type of positions will be listed. (i.e. Controllers not in the list have no controlling permission.)
Legacy_controller-list_status-active: Active: This controller is active, and be able to provide service.
Legacy_controller-list_status-absence: Inactive: This controller is inactive, need to be re-certified before providing service.
Legacy_controller-list_marker-visiting: Visiting: This controller is a visiting controller.
Legacy_controller-list_permission-restri: Restricted: This controller is not eligible to provide service to this position.
Legacy_controller-list_permission-traini: In Training: This controller is eligible to provide service to this position ONLY under supervision from a mentor
Legacy_controller-list_permission-solo: Solo Training: This controller is eligible to provide solo service to this position for the purpose of position familiarization and fluency training.
Legacy_controller-list_permission-full: Certified: The controller is fully eligible to provide solo service to this position.
Legacy_controller-list_ptwr-description: *T2: Tier 2 Permission. Training status for this permission is not displayed on this page.
Legacy_controller-list_tmu-controllers: Controllers with Traffic Management Center Permission
Legacy_controller-list_no-tmu: No controllers with Traffic Management Center Permission currently
Legacy_cookie_text: By continuing to use this website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with our Cookie Policy.

pages_airspace_sop_no-english: This page is not available in English.
warning_description_no_rvsm_1: Aircraft without RVSM capability will not be allowed to enter RVSM airspace.
warning_description_no_rvsm_2: RVSM stands for Reduced Vertical Separation Minima. In the VATPRC airspace, the RVSM altitude range is between 8,900 meters (29,100 feet) and 12,500 meters (41,100 feet) inclusive, with altitude layers separated by 300 meters. To enter this airspace, your flight plan must include W in the Equipment field.
warning_description_no_rnav1_1: Aircraft without RNAV1 capability will not be assigned RNAV departure or arrival procedures and will be radar vectored. Conventional procedures may only be used with ATC approval.
warning_description_no_rnav1_2: RNAV stands for Area Navigation. RNAV1 means that the total system error does not exceed 1 NM for 95% of the flight time. RNAV1 is used for RNAV departure and arrival procedures and may also be used for area navigation routes. However, VATPRC controllers currently only check RNAV1 capability for departure and arrival. Navigation standards for en route phases are not checked at this time. For RNAV1, your flight plan must include P in the Equipment field and D1 or D2 in the PBN/ field.
warning_description_not_preferred_route_: Please choose a preferred route from the following list, or contact ATC for assistance:
warning_short_ok: Flight looks good. Please confirm with the clearance delivery controller.
warning_title_no_rvsm: The aircraft does not specify RVSM capability.
warning_title_no_rnav1: The aircraft does not specify RNAV1 capability.
warning_title_rnp_ar: The aircraft specifies RNP AR capability with RF.
warning_title_rnp_ar_without_rf: The aircraft specifies RNP AR capability without RF.
warning_title_no_transponder: The aircraft does not specify transponder capability.
warning_title_route_direct_segment: The route contains a direct leg. Please ensure that the direct segment is valid.
warning_title_route_leg_direction: The route contains a leg with an invalid direction.
warning_title_airway_require_approval: The route contains an airway that requires controller approval.
warning_title_not_preferred_route: The flight plan does not match the preferred route for this flight.
warning_title_cruising_level_mismatch: The cruising level type does not meet the requirement of the route.
warning_title_cruising_level_too_low: The cruising level is too low for the route.
warning_title_cruising_level_not_allowed: The cruising level is not allowed for the route.
flight_edit_flight_plan: Edit your flight plan on VATSIM.

warning_description_not_preferred_route_: Please contact ATC for help adjusting the route.
